page.name: Assignment Instructions
page.content:
Overview

[[[[[An explanation of why this activity is important, ideally linking back to learning objectives.]]]]]

Objectives

  • [[[[[TBD]]]]]
  • [[[[[TBD]]]]]

Time Estimate

 [[[[[1−2 hours]]]]]

Assignment Instructions

[[[[[TBD]]]]].

If you are not sure how to go about completing the assignment, post your question to the Q & A Forum. Here your classmates and the instructor are encouraged to help you understand the assignment.

 Evaluation

[[[[TBD]]]] points possible. See [[[[rubric]]]]. See the Policies page of the Syllabus for more details.

Submission Directions

  • Submit your assignment using the following naming convention: [[[[[lastname_assignment1]]]]].
  • File formats accepted: [[[[[pdf, doc, docx, etc.]]]]]
  • To submit your work, click on the [[[[[Submit Assignment [[[[[#]]]]]]]]]] link.

Deadline

See the week-specific instructional activities table for specific deadline information.
